channel.title: Reed Video Insane Chris Bush on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: I love you justice scalia
item.description: remember to watch out. Bush is about to make a nomination to the supreme. The proposed “man” is William Pryor, a young attorney general from alabama who has some alarming views; most alarming is his stance on minority voting rights, disabled person rights, reproductive rights, and prisonors rights. he is cool enough to want the ten commandments posted at every courthouse. His reasoning for becoming a lawyer was to fight the ACLU.
